section.span: How to write marked-up text in a document.

div.p: Wrote the description for the document 'multibazaar2008'. The description contains the boldfaced titles: 'Food', 'Music', 'More' and 'Address', which is an example of markup.

section.p: Open the document for editing. Click in the multiline typingbox below a caption to type the value for that caption. The text you type may may consist of more than one line and also may contain markup, which you may add using the markup buttons at the top of the typingbox.
